author: dchristian3188
body:
Adding group filter to get-verb. Please reference:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/2527

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi __@dchristian3188__, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! You've already signed the contribution license agreement. Thanks!

The agreement was validated by Microsoft and real humans are currently evaluating your PR.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: dchristian3188
comments.body: Got it, thanks for the review Izbkr. I'll get started on the changes.

comments.author: kittholland
comments.body: Since you are using the validateset with hardcoded group names, can you add a test enumerating the possible groups and ensuring all possibilities are handled in the validateset?

comments.author: dchristian3188
comments.body: Added an additional test to cover extra groups. Please let me know if any other changes are needed.

title: Add parameter -Group to Get-Verb
